files.patch: @@ -1093,0 +1093,4 @@ + * For TLSv1.3 and later versions calling this method after the connection + * has been established will force producing a KeyUpdate message. For prior + * TLS versions it will force a renegotiation (re-handshake). + *

@@ -509,2 +509,6 @@ - * - *

If data has already been sent on the connection, it continues + *
